roleset.name: cf offer, suggestion

role.descr: who/what arg1 applies to (beneficiary, not listener)

example.name: with NP
example.text: PS of New Hampshire has proposed an internal reorganization plan.

example.name: with S
example.text: Heritage Media proposed *trace=HM* acquiring POP Radio.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG3 and ARG1
example.text: One of the tales in the Yuan dynasty work 24 Paragons of Filial Piety records that in ancient times a man named Guo Ju , who was too poor to keep his mother properly fed , proposed to his wife that they kill their three - year - old son - since he was consuming a share of the old lady 's food .
example.arg: a man named Guo Ju , who was too poor to keep his mother properly fed
that they kill their three - year - old son - since he was consuming a share of the old lady 's food

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: They proposed a ridiculous price for Georgia Gulf.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: and proposition of a name for 66 additional unknown cultivars.

example.name: with PRD (taggable node is VP)
example.text: This proposition - approved by the public - trumps a court decision .

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: There are a number of educationalists who are more radical in their proposition of a completely new paradigm in learning.
example.arg: of a completely new paradigm in learning.

example.name: infinitival arg1
example.text: they envisioned a ripe environment for their proposition to repeal the state's clean energy and air standards:
example.arg: to repeal the state's clean energy and air standards:

example.name: with arg3
example.text: The Magic are re-working their proposition to Phil Jackson with the hopes of luring him into a front office role

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: a more detailed merger proposal to much-larger Mesa Airlines

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: LIN 's proposal to spin off its television properties , payshareholders a $ 20-a-share special dividend and combine itscellular-telephone operations with BellSouth 's cellular business
example.arg: to spin off its television properties , payshareholders a $ 20-a-share special dividend and combine itscellular-telephone operations with BellSouth 's cellular business

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: proposals for state or local increases

roleset.note: PROPOSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'propose' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpusand comparison with 'offer' (from propose.01-v)
PROPOSITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, propose.01. Corresponds to VNcls reflexive_appearance-48.1.2, say-37.7-1, wish-62. (from proposition.01-n)
PROPOSAL-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns. Comparison to propose.01. Vn classes say-37.7-1, reflexive_appearance-48.1.2, and wish-62. FN class statement. Framed by Katie. (from proposal.01-n)
